mapper.insert: load data infile #{filePath} into table gather_youtube.channel character set utf8mb4 fields terminated by ',' OPTIONALLY ENCLOSED BY '"' ESCAPED BY '"' lines terminated by '\n' ignore 2 lines (id, title, description, publishedAt, thumbnails, country, uploads, viewCount, subscriberCount, hiddenSubscriberCount, videoCount)

load data infile #{filePath} into table gather_youtube.playlistItem character set utf8mb4 fields terminated by ',' OPTIONALLY ENCLOSED BY '"' ESCAPED BY '"' lines terminated by '\n' ignore 2 lines (id, publishedAt, channelId, title, description, thumbnails, channelTitle, playlistId, position, kind, videoId)

load data infile #{filePath} into table gather_youtube.video character set utf8mb4 fields terminated by ',' OPTIONALLY ENCLOSED BY '"' ESCAPED BY '"' lines terminated by '\n' ignore 2 lines (forSeq, id, tags, categoryId, liveBroadcastContent, defaultLanguage, defaultAudioLanguage, viewCount, likeCount, favoriteCount, commentCount)

load data infile #{filePath} into table gather_youtube.comment character set utf8mb4 fields terminated by ',' lines terminated by '\n' ignore 2 lines (id, videoId, kind, textOriginal, authorDisplayName, authorProfileImageUrl, authorChannelUrl, authorChannelId, canRate, viewerRating, likeCount, publishedAt, updatedAt, canReply, totalReplyCount, isPublic)
mapper.update: update youtube.linkedchannelinfo set playlistId = #{playlistId} where channelId = #{channelId}
mapper.select: select id from gather_youtube.video where date = #{date}
mapper.update: update youtube.gather_log set status = #{status}, message = #{message} where seq = #{seq}
